data: Thanks for inviting me out.{break}{mood:awkward}I don't really, uh, go on a lot of dates. I'm a bit shy, really.{break}{mood:laugh}Plus, I figure no one wants to hear me going on about boring science stuff...
{mood:happy}I was hoping you'd ask! I would love to go on a date.{break}I'm free at 20:00!

{mood:like}Oh, hello! You must be that new alchemist everyone's talking about.{break}I have always wanted to see an alchemist's regalia in real life. Wow.{break}{mood:happy}Nice to meet you. I'm Professor Zed, I run the Science Center.{break}{mood:like}You should drop by when you've seen a few Spirits. I'd love to talk research with you!
{mood:awkward}I'm sorry, but I'm... busy... with work...
If it's alright with you, I'd love to try somewhere a little different, this time...

{mood:laugh}I know, obviously, but a lot of the time I feel like the only person here who thinks it's cool!{break}{mood:like}I guess now I have you to talk to about it.{break}{mood:awkward}But not too much! I don't want to scare you off too...{break}{mood:like}Tell you what, let's go for a walk on the beach.{break}{mood:happy}You can tell me what you know about spirits so far!

{mood:like}Aw, thanks. I hope you're right.{break}{mood:default}Sometimes I feel like it would be easier to just... pretend to be a bit more normal.{break}{npc:up}Maybe then I could actually make some friends instead of hiding in the science center.{break}{mood:like}Thanks for getting me out here instead.{break}Would you like to go for a walk?{break}{mood:happy}You can tell me about the spirits you've encountered so far!
{mood:happy}Oh, wow! These are my favourite!{break}{mood:like}I'm going to make myself a pie.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you so much!

Ha, you don't have to tell me twice. Trust me, I know.{break}{mood:sad}Sorry for bring a buzzkill.{break}This is why I don't go on dates, I guess.{break}{mood:default}Sorry to cut this short, but I have a time-sensitive experiment back at home.{break}I'll see you around.
{mood:like}Oh, I can use this to finish an experiment I'm running!{break}Thanks!

I love looking at the ocean, but I can't stand BEING in it.{break}{mood:dislike}I hate being cold and wet! Or either of them at any time!{break}{mood:like}If I could pick any superpower, it would be hibernating through Winter.{break}What would your superpower be?
{mood:dislike}Oh, uh, thanks.{break}Just for future reference, I don't really like things like this. I'm not the crafty type.
{mood:dislike}Gotta be honest... I'm kinda allergic to this.{break}{mood:awkward}Even just the smell... ugh. Sorry.
Oh, by the way... I was worried about you.{break}{mood:sad}You never turned up for our date...{break}It's okay if you had other things to do.{break}I just thought maybe you'd got hurt...

{mood:laugh}Ohhhh, that's WAY better than mine!{break}{mood:like}I always liked the word "omniscience".{break}{mood:laugh}Although I used to pronounce it "omni-science".{break}{mood:like}Anyway, I could put up with Winter if I had the chance to know EVERYTHING.{break}{mood:happy}I'd be a walking encyclopedia! Never be stumped again! Always win at trivia!{break}{mood:like}That's a great pick. You're smart.{break}Okay, what would your superVILLAIN power be...?

Oh, I could NEVER live with laser vision.{break}I'd be like that king from myth who kept turning people into gold.{break}Except instead of gold, I'd turn everyone I ever loved into melty flesh piles.{break}{mood:laugh}I'll stick with hibernation!{break}Okay, what would your superVILLAIN power be...?

{mood:awkward}Oh, I'm so sorry, it's because I'm being boring again, isn't it?{break}{mood:default}We can just end the date here!{break}{npc:down}I, uh, I have to prepare some research papers anyway...
Well... If you want to try again some time, we can.{break}If you'll definitely come, I mean.{break}{mood:sad}Being stood up really sucks in a town this small.

{npc:down}{mood:happy}Wow! Look at this!{break}It's a fossil, look! This is incredible... We rarely get these up here.{break}{mood:like}I think it's an ammonite. You can tell by the spiral, see?{break}It's so detailed, so well preserved...{break}{mood:happy}Oh, Cleo is going to LOVE this.
{mood:like}I got a letter from my parents today, wishing me a happy birthday.{break}{mood:happy}They're so sweet.{break}They even drew a picture of me, look!
I love when you get excited about things.
{mood:happy}Did you get me this because it's my birthday? Thank you!{break}{mood:default}Wait, did you know it was my birthday?{break}Did... did I tell you it was my birthday?
Is it the fossil of a Spirit?
{mood:awkward}Oh, um...{break}...thanks?{break}{npc:right}I think I'm just gonna put this... over... here.{break}Maybe Gaiana or Ferra would want it...
{mood:sad}I skipped my morning coffee today.{break}Now I'm in dire need of a nap.

{mood:like}Oh, no one's ever said that to me...{break}{mood:default}Usually I can see people's eyes glazing over.{break}I know they're trying their best to listen, but I get carried away sometimes!{break}{mood:like}What I mean to say is, um... thank you.{break}I feel like I can be myself around you. That means a lot.{break}{mood:happy}My full, nerdy self. Haha.{break}{mood:like}I need to head back home, but thank you so much for the date.
{mood:awkward}I feel like I have barely any social skills after being in school for so long.

{mood:like}I think so, yes! Some kind of spiral-shelled cephalopod Spirit, perhaps.{break}{mood:happy}If you look here, you can see where its body must have been. Wow!{break}You know, people used to think they were ossified snakes, because they were coiled up, and...{break}{mood:awkward}...Sorry, I'm doing the thing again where I talk your ear off.{break}{mood:happy}I should head home! Thank you for the date!
I am one sleepy Zed today.{break}*yawn*{break}{mood:sad}I think it's about time for a coffee.

{mood:awkward}Ah, sorry, yeah... I'm doing the thing where I talk too much.{break}{mood:like}Sorry, I'm not good at, um, this. I don't know how to do normal talk.{break}{npc:left}{mood:awkward}I think I'm going to head home early...{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry for ruining the date with my boring nerd stuff!
Did you see the clouds last night?{break}{mood:happy}Meteorology isn't my subject, but wow!
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
Are you working at the weekend? Me too!

...yeah, I worry a lot about it, actually.{break}Like I wasted my youth studying.{break}Everyone else has settled down, had kids, made friends...{break}{mood:sad}I feel like I'm just starting out still.{break}{npc:down}Even though there aren't many people to compare myself to here, I still feel like I'm so behind.
{mood:love}Are you asking me to... to... go steady with you?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm sorry, that's so old-fashioned!{break}{mood:like}It's just... I've not... been given one of these before...
Do you think I'd look good in a hat?
Life isn't a race. It's a story.
Don't work too hard!{break}Burnout will catch up with you if you're not careful.
Being a scientist is more interesting than being a dad.
{mood:happy}I would be honoured to be your partner!{break}{mood:love}You have no idea how much this means to me.
I'd love to hear about your work sometime... if you want.

{npc:left}A story? Hmm. I guess so.{break}Like, everyone's is different and unique and worthwhile?{break}It's always felt like a race, but that's clearly not getting me anywhere, just making me sad.{break}{mood:like}In that case... I hope I can tell a good story, at the end of it all.{break}Would you like to walk down the beach with me before we call it a night?
X squared... plus Y squared... equals... hmmm...

But that's just it! I don't know if I can catch up.{break}Or if I will. Or if I want to.{break}{npc:down}{mood:sad}I don't know what I want, because I never took the time to find out. I just kept studying.{break}{mood:default}The thing with studying is that you can keep your nose in a book and ignore the whole world outside of it.{break}I'm only just learning now... that the world keeps happening whether you're paying attention or not.{break}{npc:left}Anyway. Enough of that.{break}{mood:like}Come on, let's take a quick walk down the beach before we call it a night.
Hm? What was I just thinking about?

I want to be both, though. Some day.{break}{mood:sad}But it's hard to fit that in.{break}{mood:default}Besides, I disagree.{break}{mood:like}I think being a dad... would be incredible. Maybe the best thing I've done.{break}Science is incredible, but raising a kid is so personal.{break}{mood:default}I just need to find someone who feels the same way.{break}{npc:left}...I need to head back to the lab before bed.{break}I have some late-night experiments to set up.{break}{mood:like}Thank you for a lovely date. Good night.
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
I like my name... but I hate being last alphabetically.
{mood:awkward}Oh! Um... It might be a bit early in the relationship for, um, that.{break}It's not that I don't like you, I just...{break}{mood:sad}I'm not ready to commit like that yet.{break}Sorry.
I'm thinking about doing a scientific survey...

{mood:awkward}You know, I was feeling really nervous before I got here, so uh, I wrote a few... conversation topics.{break}{mood:like}So, uh, I'm just gonna break those out, and that way, I won't feel as anxious about talking to you. Okay? Okay.{break}{mood:default}Question number one.{break}If we were NPCs in a video game, what do you think would be your loot if someone killed you?
...Does this mean you want to... end things?
*Tell him the exact contents of your inventory right now*
I hope it rains tomorrow.{break}I have an experiment that would benefit from precipitation.
Stonefruit and a ton of wood, probably.
Talking about murder isn't a great date topic...

{mood:sad}...I have to be honest, I...{break}I really thought you might be the one.{break}Sorry, I know that's not what I should say, but...{break}...Nothing. Nothing, just...{break}...Forget I said anything. I'm sorry.
There's too much work to do!{break}I'll just have to power through.

{mood:laugh}Wow. How big are your pockets? That's a lot of stuff.{break}{mood:like}You must be really strong to carry all of that. I mean, you've got a good physique, so...{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, objectively! Uh... Next question: If you had a stamina bar...
{mood:sad}Oh, thank goodness.{break}Wow, that... hurt more than I was expecting.
Are you any good at fighting games?{break}{mood:like}I'm trying to find a player 2...

{mood:laugh}Yeah, I've seen you picking up a lot of stonefruit. You must really like it.{break}{mood:awkward}Not that I'm watching you! I just look out the window a lot, and uh...{break}Okay, next question. If you had a stamina bar...
{mood:laugh}That telescope in my house cost the entirety of my savings.

{mood:awkward}You're totally right, I'm so sorry! I'm such an idiot.{break}{npc:right}{mood:dislike}Great job again, Zed. This is why you're always alone in your stupid tower.{break}{npc:left}{mood:awkward}Listen, it's been really nice, but I feel like I messed this one up.{break}{mood:sad}So, I'm just going to... go home... Sorry again.
{mood:like}There's an interesting lunar phenomenon tonight.{break}Or was it next week? I forget...

So, I actually made the fireworks that we're letting off tonight. With Ferra's help.{break}{mood:like}Don't worry, they're all safe. It's not my first time making explosives!{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, the fun kind of explosives. The fireworks kind.{break}{mood:happy}Uh, anyway... do you want to watch them... with me?
Is that a bruise on your arm?{break}{mood:awkward}Be careful, those spirits are fierce!

Remember last time we were here, with the conversation topics?{break}{mood:laugh}I know that was weird, but it actually helped me feel less nervous.{break}{mood:like}So, um, I made some more.{break}Question number one...{break}When you land on a new island, what's the first thing you do?
I'll get back to you about that.
I've spent so much time inside today.{break}It's not good! I need fresh air to get my brain juices flowing.
{mood:happy}Amazing! They're going to be really good this year.{break}I tried a new recipe using Spirit resources...
Sometimes, at night, you can see ancient satellites in the sky.
I was thinking of taking a research trip some day.

{mood:happy}That's what I would do!{break}{mood:like}I mean, you can't make any decisions until you know what you're working with.{break}{mood:laugh}It's probably much easier to map something out when you can fly, though.{break}{mood:like}Alright. Question two. How do you hold so much stuff in your pockets...?
I wish I could sleep through the winter...

{mood:awkward}There's TREASURE out there?{break}{mood:default}I had no idea.{break}I mean, actual treasure? Chests full of doubloons?{break}{mood:laugh}Wow. You're gonna ruin the local economy.{break}{mood:like}Just kidding.{break}Alright. Question two. How do you hold so much stuff in your pockets...?
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
Do you ever wish you could pause everything for a day, just so you can catch up?

{mood:awkward}You mean, the spirits?{break}{mood:default}I knew you fought them, but...{break}{mood:sad}I didn't realise you were, um, the aggressor.{break}{mood:default}How do you know if they're peaceful or not?{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I'm asking too many questions.{break}{mood:default}Um... Question two. How do you hold so much stuff in your pockets...?
{mood:love}After so many years studying them... I can't believe... I have a Spirit of my own...{break}{mood:happy}You're incredible, Alchemist! As a thank you, please take this crafting recipe.
I wish I had more time for my hobbies.

{mood:happy}Oh! You found me a Spirit?{break}{mood:like}This guy is very cool, but not quite the right vibe for me, you know?{break}{mood:happy}Maybe something with really long arms? So he can help me hold test tubes and stuff?
Apparently some plants can hibernate.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm quite jealous.

{mood:happy}Hiiiiiiiiii!!!!{break}You know, I actually got here a bit before you. I was nervous... again.{break}{mood:awkward}So I had an exshtra drink. Or two. For courage.{break}{mood:love}You make me so nervous! You're sho PRETTY, and I'm such a dork around you...
I like you the way you are.
{mood:happy}Thanks! That was fast!{break}{mood:like}Here, take this. I was going to pay for a delivery, but now I don't have to!
I think we should get you home.

{mood:happy}Happy Spring!{break}I'm not much of a Spring kinda guy, but I do love the rain.{break}Rain means I get to stay inside and read, with a nice hot cup of tea and a blanket.{break}{mood:laugh}I know. I'm so cool.

{mood:awkward}Noooo, you're making it WORSE! All my blood is all in my face.{break}{mood:dislike}I need my blood in my BRAIN for thinking. Not in my face for blushing.{break}{mood:like}You're cute.{break}{mood:default}...{break}{mood:awkward}Please excuse me.{break}It is time for me to maybe throw up a little bit.

The spirits out there tend to gather in places that match their elemental type.{break}But be careful, okay?{break}There are islands out there with dangerous poison swamps, and lava...{break}{mood:awkward}I heard there are some islands with neverending electrical storms!! Please stay safe!

Yeahhh, I think I overdid it. I don't drink mucsh usually...{break}{mood:sad}I'm sorryyyyy. I jusht wish there was a way I could be cool around you.{break}{mood:default}You make me feel like I want to feel like this all the time like this.{break}{mood:dislike}...I'm a sciencetist not a wordstist.{break}{mood:laugh}How 'bout we forget this happened and I just go home?{break}{mood:happy}Next time I'll drink... a lot less.
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
Feel free to check out the exhibits.{break}{mood:happy}And feel free to donate spirit materials if you have any spare!
{mood:dislike}Nooooo I, don't, WANT shots.{break}I wanna have a naaaap.{break}{mood:happy}And popcorn.{break}{mood:dislike}And a nap.{break}{mood:laugh}Can you walk me home? I'm aaaaaall wiggly.
{mood:like}Are you asking me to... marry you?
How's it going? I hear you've been taming those spirits.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe some day I'll join you on your adventures!
I am! What do you say?

{mood:like}Did you know that some spirits have beneficial effects?{break}For example, the noble Claudio...{break}Its ability increases your speed, but only on rainy days.{break}{mood:happy}Isn't that fascinating?

I am so glad you asked me out again after... last time we were here.{break}{mood:awkward}I am SO sorry. I behaved like an idiot.{break}{mood:sad}I usually don't drink much at all, but I guess that's a sign of how nervous I was.{break}{mood:default}I meant what I said... about... you being, um, pretty.{break}{mood:laugh}You can forget everything else though. I sure did.
How's it going? Found any new spirits out there?
*spill beer on yourself* Now we're even!
{mood:happy}I say yes! I've never been more sure of anything in my life!{break}{mood:love}I'm the luckiest guy in the world.
I was just reading about this spirit called a Darkoffee.{break}Apparently, they can help restore their owner's stamina.{break}{mood:like}Isn't that incredible?
I thought it was kinda cute.
{mood:awkward}Oh, haha... then, um... just... forget what I said. I was, uh, joking.{break}{mood:sad}I, uh... have to go... do science stuff.
Cleo says she has some new books she wants me to borrow.{break}I hope they're not more historical tomes.{break}History isn't nearly as interesting as the sciences!
{mood:happy}If you do find any new creatures, make sure to show me!

{mood:awkward}Did you seriously just pour an entire beer on yourself?{break}Just to make me feel better about embarrassing myself last time?!{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}You're so weird. In a good way!{break}{mood:like}Come on. Let's go see if Ossono has a towel.{break}{mood:happy}And we can get you a new drink.{break}{mood:laugh}I think you've successfully levelled the playing field.
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
So, how do you figure out new alchemy recipes? It seems like magic to me.{break}{mood:laugh}Of course, I know it's science!

{mood:laugh}That's a relief.{break}I didn't FEEL cute.{break}{mood:like}I mean it, though. I don't think we should do dates here again.{break}You deserve better than Messy Zed.{break}Maybe next time, we pick some place else, okay?
{mood:awkward}Wow, um... that's really flattering, but... isn't it a bit soon?
What's your drink of choice?{break}I've always wanted to drink neat whisky, but it smells WAY too much like rubbing alcohol to me.{break}{mood:laugh}Guess I'll never be a Cool Whisky Guy.

{mood:awkward}Was it really that bad?{break}Ossono said I wasn't a total embarrassment...{break}{mood:sad}I hope I haven't ruined things.{break}{mood:default}I won't touch another drop when we're on dates.{break}I don't want to risk scaring you off!{break}{mood:like}How about next time, we go some place else?
{mood:like}Ossono lets me eat at the tavern for free in exchange for helping with chores.{break}It's a lifesaver. Telescopes and test tubes are EXPENSIVE.
{mood:happy}Congratulations to you both!{break}This is the best wedding I've ever been to. Also, the first. But it was great!

Zed? Oh, no, it's not short for anything.{break}{mood:happy}My parents just liked the letter, I guess.{break}{mood:like}I think it might have been a reference to something, but they never told me what.
I like to come up here to check on the other islands.{break}If they're sinking, moving closer, moving away...{break}We have to keep an eye on these things.

{npc:down}{mood:like}It's so relaxing in here. I feel like I haven't relaxed in a hundred years.{break}...{break}{npc:left}Can I ask you a question? And you'll be totally honest?{break}{mood:default}...What do you think of me?
{mood:happy}Hey, you! Do you want to... head home?
I think you care a lot about what other people think.
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
{mood:happy}Happy Summer! Now you'll get to meet Summer Zed.{break}{mood:laugh}He is very similar to Spring Zed, except sometimes he wears sunglasses.
I think you think too much.
Do you think I'm more of a nerd, or a dork?{break}Actually...{break}{npc:down}...{break}{mood:laugh}Don't answer that.

{mood:awkward}Wow, I uh... I wasn't expecting that.{break}I'm, uh, I'm not blushing, it's just, uh, the heat. Yeah.{break}{npc:right}Unrelatedly, I have to go, and, uh, um.{break}The... you... uh, thank you.{break}And...{break}...Sorry, I mean, um...{break}Thank you for... um...{break}BYE.

{mood:happy}Partaaaaayyy!{break}{mood:like}Before you arrived, we didn't have *nearly* this many big events. You've given us so much to celebrate!{break}{mood:laugh}But, erm, on a professional note... thanks for sorting out that rift thing.
Maybe I'm a nerd AND a dork.{break}A... derd.

{npc:down}...Huh.{break}...{break}{npc:left}...I wasn't expecting you to say something like that, but I guess you're right.{break}Worrying about how I come across to people... it takes up so much of my time.{break}I guess I just want to prove myself.{break}But maybe... maybe I don't need to.{break}{mood:laugh}Man, I should be paying you a therapist's fee.{break}{mood:like}How about I pay you back with dinner some time?
{mood:dislike}I thought I made a breakthrough last night, but I was wrong.{break}{mood:angry}I had to undo hours of work. It's so frustrating when that happens.

{mood:dislike}Well, it is my job.{break}{npc:down}{mood:default}*sigh* No, you're right. I'm sorry, I feel like I'm ruining things again.{break}I'm just going to head home early, I think.{break}Thanks for the date. Sorry for... ruining it.
{mood:happy} Oooh, this smells like Pizzafish Pie! That's my all-time favourite! Thank you so much!
{mood:sad}I made an iced coffee this morning, and it tasted off.{break}{mood:default}Was it the milk? The ice? The water?{break}I'll have to run some tests...
I had my windows open this morning so I could listen to the rain.

{mood:like}I always thought that it would be cool if there were fish in here.{break}I know they'd cook in the heat, but... imagine heat-resistant fish!{break}And then you'd have to try to catch 'em all...{break}{mood:happy}And if you do, you get free entry next time. Genius.
{mood:happy}THIS IS SO EXCITING.{break}I can't believe we might get to see a real, live deity of the Old Kingdom!{break}{mood:like}Do you think you'd want to watch it... with me?
So, you really don't have any qualifications in farming?{break}You just... started doing it?{break}That's so interesting.
How do you cook heat-resistant fish?
{mood:like}Have you tamed a Fishbo yet?{break}{mood:happy}I love Fishbo.
{mood:dislike}Ferra is a BAD INFLUENCE.{break}In related news, I am very hungover.{break}{mood:sad}When will I learn...
Aren't you supposed to be smart?

{mood:like}I am so excited to see the Spirit migration patterns! It's really rare to see it happen, you know.{break}{mood:sad}I'm writing a research paper about it, but it's slow going, since I can only see it once a year...{break}{mood:happy}Do you want to watch the meteor shower with me? I can tell you facts!
I re-organised my wardrobe this weekend.{break}{mood:laugh}It's a lot easier when you have ten of the same outfit.

Huh, I guess you couldn't.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe they're sushi fish, then.{break}{mood:like}Admittedly, I haven't figured out all the kinks.{break}{mood:happy}But that's what science is all about! Iteration! Experimentation! Discovery!{break}{mood:like}Like these dates. They're iterative and experimental, too.{break}{mood:happy}I'm still figuring out the conclusion, but my hypothesis is positive!{break}{mood:like}Let's do another five minutes in the water... then I need to head home, okay?
{mood:happy}Oh, great! I have SO many facts...
Tobin and I were just discussing... something.{break}I forgot.{break}{mood:laugh}Probably because of all the pints. Hehe.

{mood:laugh}Oh... right. Good point.{break}{mood:happy}See, this is why we make a great team.{break}{mood:like}You catch the holes in my logic, and I...{break}Well, I hope I offer some kind of benefit in return.{break}Maybe some day I can cook for you?{break}{mood:happy}Let's plan a dinner date at my house some time!{break}{mood:like}I need to get out and head home now.{break}I'll walk you home first. Come on!
{mood:like}Summer beach Zed is very chill.{break}Summer beach Zed only reads novels about fluffy romance.{break}Summer beach Zed says science can wait.

{mood:sad}Aw, I thought it was a fun idea.{break}{mood:default}I guess not all my ideas can be prize-winners.{break}Well, speaking of fish, I actually haven't eaten dinner yet.{break}I came straight here from work!{break}I would invite you to dine with me, but...{break}{mood:laugh}I've only got enough food for one! Sorry!{break}{mood:like}But maybe we could plan a date with dinner at some point?{break}{mood:happy}For now, I bid you adieu.

Don't tell anyone I said this, but I've always wondered what Spirits taste like.{break}{mood:laugh}I mean, don't tell me you've never thought about taking a bite of Womrâ€™s apple.{break}{mood:awkward}It's just a question! I'm not going to try it!

{mood:happy}Come in, come in!{break}{mood:like}I just finished writing up my notes on Capacibee.{break}You probably know this, but... Capacibee can recover from fainting!{break}I think that's remarkable. I just don't know HOW they do it.
{mood:like}Isn't it beautiful here?{break}{mood:love}Not as beautiful as you, though.

...so the underground water pockets are heated by geothermal energy.{break}There's actually a lot of earth beneath this island. More than it looks.{break}I haven't quite figured out where the geothermal energy comes from, but I hypothesise...{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I'm talking your ear off, aren't I.{break}{mood:default}I get carried away with things I'm interested in, but I don't want to bore you!{break}{mood:like}Tell you what, why don't you ask ME something? Anything!
Did you know that there's a word for the smell after rain?{break}{mood:like}It's called "petrichor". Cleo taught me that.
Where did you learn to fix arcade cabinets?
